movie.title: David Golder
movie.description_intro: David is a poor but ambitious Polish Jew who reinvents himself as a powerful New York business magnate. After gaining wealth, he relocates to Paris, only to have his selfish and demanding wife squander his fortune.
movie.description_full: David is a poor but ambitious Polish Jew who reinvents himself as a powerful New York business magnate. After gaining wealth, he relocates to Paris, only to have his selfish and demanding wife squander his fortune.

movies.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
movies.summary: Steven Russell is happily married to Debbie, and a member of the local police force when a car accident provokes a dramatic reassessment of his life. Steven becomes open about his homosexuality and decides to live life to the fullest - even if it means breaking the law. Steven's new, extravagant lifestyle involves cons and fraud and, eventually, a stay in the State Penitentiary where he meets sensitive, soft-spoken Phillip Morris. His devotion to freeing Phillip from jail and building the perfect life together prompts Steven to attempt and often succeed at one impossible con after another.

His devotion to freeing Phillip from jail and building the perfect life together prompts Steven to attempt and often succeed at one impossible con after another.

movies.title: Targets
movies.summary: Byron Orlok is an old horror-movie star who feels that he is an anachronism. Compared to real-life violence, his films are tame. Meanwhile, Bobby Thompson goes on a killing spree...

movies.title: King Charles
movies.summary: An un-ethical DEA agent does everything in his power within and outside the law to catch a cocaine kingpin.
movies.description_full: An un-ethical DEA agent does everything in his power within and outside the law to catch a cocaine kingpin.

movies.title: Passion
movies.summary: Wendy (Sylvia Chang) and Ming (Cora Miao) are very good friends for many years. Both of them are widows and each has a daughter living with them.
